articles.title: The Art of Coding
articles.subtitle: Creative Programming for Young Artists
articles.excerpt: Combine creativity with technology! Learn how to create digital art, animations, and interactive stories using code.

articles.title: Chemistry in the Kitchen
articles.subtitle: Fun Science Experiments You Can Do at Home
articles.excerpt: Discover the amazing world of chemistry right in your own kitchen! Learn about chemical reactions, acids and bases, and conduct safe experiments.

featureImage.alt: Colorful chemistry experiment with bubbling liquids

articles.title: Introduction to Robotics for Kids
articles.subtitle: Building Your First Robot
articles.excerpt: Learn the basics of robotics with this beginner-friendly guide. We'll explore what robots are, how they work, and build a simple robot together.
